meanings.definition: The front hoof of a horse.
meanings.sent1: The forehoof of the horse was strong and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The farrier trimmed the forehoof of the horse.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous foal tried to nibble on the forehoof of the older mare.
meanings.sent4: With each gallop, the forehoof of the horse beat a steady rhythm on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The shiny black forehoof left distinct imprints in the soft mud.
